verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: attacked] [ARG1: former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] , [ARGM-ADV: rebuking the former intelligence chief for remarks he made on " The View " about surveillance of Trump 's campaign] .

[ARG0: President Trump] on Thursday attacked former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper on Twitter , [V: rebuking] [ARG1: the former intelligence chief] [ARG2: for remarks he made on " The View " about surveillance of Trump 's campaign] .

President Trump on Thursday attacked former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper on Twitter , rebuking the former intelligence chief for [ARG1: remarks] [ARG0: he] [V: made] [ARGM-LOC: on " The View "] about surveillance of Trump 's campaign .
